name: Courtyard Los Angeles LAX/Century Boulevard

reviews.text: I wasn't in LA on business, but stayed there anyways. Rooms are very large, nicely decorated and the beds were ultra-comfortable. A clean property as well.
reviews.title: Definitely tailored for the business traveler
Great location!
reviews.text: Weird room set-up... there's a closet divider that separates the desk area from the bed. I guess that provides some privacy if you're doing business work.
If you're planning on using the fitness center, don't expect too much. A couple of treadmills and an outdated combination weight machine. The hot tub outside of the fitness center looked OK, however.
reviews.title: Great Location - Friendly Staff

reviews.text: Plusses: Free coffee in the morning, free paper, small convenience store in the hotel for toiletries and snacks (can charge to room)
reviews.title: Convenient, Friendly, Comfortable LAX Airport Hotel

aka: Courtyard Los Angeles Lax/Century Boulevard Hotel Los Angeles
